TopicTitle: The one thing that really grinds your gears.

Articles.Content: People who keep bringing up the past when it can't or shouldn't be changed
When you find out some one that died ,and you believe "if i were there to help it could made a difference."
When people become overly paranoid and irrational.
When you don't have enough oil to make sure my gears don't grind each other.

What grinds my gears?

I'll tell you what Grinds my gears.

When people insist in something being physically possible(and accept it as true, and spread that false facts).

Good example; Portal 2 ending

Wheatley's final velocity was really no where near the moon's escape velocity. it can't happen. Portal's conserve momentum. Air rushing into a vacuum does NOT reach 2.4 KM/s (2400 M/S)
When people don't oil the moving parts of a bike ,or just scrap metal against metal.
When women lies(not lying in bed besides you but lying to your face)
When people don't know about the maker fair.
Having to yell at a group of treasured friends because they're all acting like jackasses.

When you are forced to make friends with some argumental douchebag because your friends with one of his friends. Also, when said douchebag refuses to let a match of Civ V progress longer than 3 hours.
Headaches due to a lack of sleep and food.
When your feel something on your skin ,but there is nothing there.
Urge to take a dump, and you go but there's nothing going out. And again. And again.
When your body plays tricks on you.

When your body plays tricks on you.

How do you mean ? Food and sleep ga, been there... I like eating but sometimes i fprget amd the whole day gets *ucked

The number 1 thing that grind me is women that plays games. If you like then tell me lol

We all have it, the single thing we hate more than anything. Could be anything from losing your keys to... being shot at?

For me it has to be seeing people who are just minding their own business getting picked on and bullied. I once saw a boy picking on a young Pakistani girl and using some horrible terms. I grabbed his hand, sprained his wrist and broke 2 fingers.

What about you guys? Anything that really gets you going?

Oh and

>mfw

So you physically assaulted someone for verbally assaulting someone else? Makes perfect sense....
The thing that grinds my teeth isW>>HY, why are innocent people getting killed
When people don't oil there bikes ,or fix that exhaust port from hit the ground while they drive there car.

http://www.theflatearthsociety.org/forum/index.php

I don't wanna live in this planet anymore! D:

ooooohohohohohhhhhhhhhhh wwhhatt how is this still possible. how can such idiots exist. WHWHY!Y!Y!Y!Y!!

i need to go hijack a spaceshuttle now, one way to get as far away from these morons as possible
when there are people electing a cat for an official office.
When kids at my school act like they're "The Stuff", when they're not.
Waking up to what hopes to be an exciting day, then getting hit in the face with why your relationship's on the rocks.

Biggest thing of them all would have to be this:

When everyone gets punished because a few people had to go and mess things up.

And the worst thing about mass punishment these days is they won't let you go after the people who messed it up. Defeating the entire point of mass punishment of where if you mess up, everyone suffers, and then they are allowed to take it out on said person who ruined it for them.
When the innocent get taken out, and no one ever considers them.
When everyone starts to notice the Space junk problem years later....I need space insurance.
